title: CX Daily: Mounting Competition In China Comes At A Bad Time For Tesla
text: Tesla / Analysis: Mounting competition in China comes at a bad time for Tesla More of Tesla’s Chinese rivals are catching up in the sales race just as the U.S. electric-vehicle (EV) maker finds itself in a lull between product launches. Tesla’s enviable sales growth is set to slow this year as it remains more than a year away from launching the next generation of models that it is counting on to drive a new wave of growth.
